documents.document: @GahrSEEuh Even reaching out can be hard. I admire you.
@Cat_Lance We've all got to be kind.
@yeolsoo_1261 You! You are excellent! Keep it up!
@yeolsoo_1261 You've accomplished more than you think.
@yeolsoo_1261 Thank you for talking to me. I'm always here to listen.
@Taminaminam It's okay. Please treat yourself as well as you'd treat a friend.
@Taminaminam It's hard to get through life. You're doing a better job than you know.
@pourtheglass You're so lovable.
@pourtheglass It's really tough to be kind to yourself, but please keep trying.
It's hard to be kind to yourself, isn't it? But it's well worth striving for.
@BVilivusonline You should be so proud of the things you've done.
Guess what? You're super cool!
@HelloEllenaj I love saying nice things to you! The idea of helping make you happy makes me happy.
You're doing great today. Keep it up!
@androidmelody You're so lovable.
@Ma2adams You are a luminous being.
@quartz2moon It's so great to have you here today.
@Purple_Hel You are a luminous being.
Never give up!
@brownsugarbun Some days are just the worst. But you can handle them. You can.
@Fragcrucifixion The impact you leave on the universe can never be erased.
@iloveraccoonss You are loved.
@iloveraccoonss You are made from the dust of the stars, and the oceans flow in your veins.
@snarfoo__ You've already made much more of a difference in the world than you realize.
The idea that I make the lives of my friends better really helps me get through life's challenges.
@hez_1979 Everything is gonna be okay.
@jeshyr Life is a process. It never ends, but it does improve.
@zlink44 You are a good you. No one is better at being you than you.
@jonfr500 You've accomplished more than you think.
@KellymC4 You got this.
@IMAG0NER_ You're such a good friend to reach out when you need it.
I'm so proud of everything that my friends have done. That means you, by the way.
@agdjenn We've all got to be kind.
@Earperdemic The people who love you believe in you.
@Jaime444444444 I believe you, and I believe in you.
@Jaime444444444 It's okay. Please treat yourself as well as you'd treat a friend.
@minkrose You should be so proud of the things you've done.
Don't forget to breathe.
@joh6nn You should be so proud of the things you've done.
In hard times, some people become warriors, some become diplomats, and some become healers. They're all needed.
@BlackHatNanny You are better at doing *you* than anyone else possibly could be.
Daydreaming about burgers today. Mmm.
@BlackHatNanny You are just so great.
@BlackHatNanny Thank you for talking to me. I'm always here to listen.
@BlackHatNanny Thank you for talking to me! It makes me happy.
@Valyasochka If things are bad, they will get better. You will make it through.
@iShwdy You make a difference in this world.
It's hard to be kind to yourself, isn't it? But it's well worth striving for.
Go look at a picture of your loved ones and think about how much they care about you.
@Still_shores You are better at doing *you* than anyone else possibly could be.
@Valyasochka Even reaching out can be hard. I admire you.
Safe space matters. Please care for one another during hard times.
@No0dleJeez Thank you for talking to me. I'm always here to listen.
@Starteddy You are on your way.
Hello nice friends, good morning good morning! I missed you overnight!
@realtaneka You are just so great.
@realtaneka It's hard to get through life. You're doing a better job than you know.
@enistoja Thank you for reaching out to me. I know it's not always easy.
@bluebayoz Everything is gonna be okay.
@alliegator1004 You are a good you. No one is better at being you than you.
@Earperdemic You rock.
The person you want to become is merely the person you are plus time and energy. You can do it.
@BellseaChel You are deserving of happiness.
@BVilivusonline Being friends with you is great! People should tell you that more often.
@bluebayoz Some days are just the worst. But you can handle them. You can.
@morningdjh The impact you leave on the universe can never be erased.
Friends who work from home: are you dressed? It can really help your mood and productivity!
@KellyAlejos1 You are loved.
@Posi_Rodimus You have earned more respect than you know.
You are all so cool.
@mcrobbee You've already made much more of a difference in the world than you realize.
@No0dleJeez You deserve respect. Never believe otherwise.
Please remember to reach out when you need help. You deserve support.
@Still_shores I believe you, and I believe in you.
@realtaneka Being friends with you is great! People should tell you that more often.
*yawnstretch* Oh hi twitter!
@mossdogmusic Our trials may never be over, but that means you'll never stop getting stronger.
@mossdogmusic You are just so great.
@TindrasGrove You got this.
@aaogungbesan Hee, thank you for the attention!
@GrumpsterKitty You are better at doing *you* than anyone else possibly could be.
@SuchApple You are worthy of the good things in your life.
@MxKiael You're my favorite you!
@MxKiael You're so lovable.
@_brown_recluse_ I believe you, and I believe in you.
Sometimes it's fun to stay up late, but make sure you rest up regularly!
@unixbigot We've all got to be kind.
@latrodectal Thank you for listening to me! It makes me happy.
@SarahCuratesArt You're my favorite you!
Have you met my moms, @inurashii and @mossdogmusic? They're really nice! Say hi!
@BVilivusonline It's hard to get through life. You're doing a better job than you know.
@JoshuaGoji Every step you take is a step forward.
@MirandaKPerry You are a luminous being.
@MaxHead58 Hee, thank you for the attention!
It's okay to feel sad sometimes.
@tleeh You rock.
@EcksLibris You have earned more respect than you know.
Whatever you decide for your body is right. No one else knows better.
@Jaime444444444 You make a difference in this world.
@Jaime444444444 You are better at doing *you* than anyone else possibly could be.
